name: Sound In Color
description:
In a gray, joyless world, the power of music can bring back color and happiness. Rock out on your guitar to restore people's joy and paint the town red. Be on the lookout for the Fun Police in this fun arcade shooter with a punk/anti-authority feel. Bring hope to the world with the healing power of Rock'N Roll!


Made during Global Game Jam 2017.

Credits:

Carlos Cerros - Programmer

Chooch Reardon - Sound Designer

Christian DeCoster - Designer/Producer

Darius Watts - Programmer

Heriberto Calderon - 3D Modeller

Katie Krystyniak - 2D Artist/3D Modeller

Nicole Staiti - 3D Modeller

Sean Wolstenholme - Level Design
